item.title: Data Visualization
item.description: Today we are going to go over some basic data visualization techniques using the Lahman dataset, dplyr, ggplot2, and ggiraph. Our goal will be to create a scatter plot that shows elite homerun hitters (that we will define as >= 400 career homeruns) and a comparison of there strikeouts. Letâ€™s start by loading the necessary packages. library(Lahman) library(dplyr) library(ggiraph) library(ggplot2) Now, we must filter and summarize hitters that were able to hit 400 homeruns in their careers.
